description: Black screen with faint low-frequency drone initiating the bed.
Close-up digital flip clock changing to 6:00; alarm beep cuts mid-tone.
Medium shot of woman sitting up instantly in bed; hair untouched, posture upright, hand reaches for pill bottle while drone holds.
Close-up pill placed on tongue, dry swallow without water, tight throat with strained gulp.
Close-up as she drinks water; mechanical relief with a glass clink.
Extreme close-up phone screen showing health chart perfectly in range; drone subtly increases.
Extreme close-up of her hand trembling for half a second while holding the phone; micro-flutter in the drone.
Medium shot kitchen: she weighs food precisely with efficient, slightly rigid movements and precise clinks.
Long shot tying shoes, standing with breath held; door closes exactly on time with a clean latch click as drone cuts.
Medium shot in dim interior; close-up jaw clenched, mask intact and strained as cyclical drone returns.
Close-up ceiling where a bead of water forms, hangs, and falls with isolated sharp plink.
Close-up her face with a tiny flinch before recognition and subtle breath hitch.
Medium shot grabbing the mop; handle scrape audible.
Close-up mop sweeping water with wet swoosh under the plink.
Flashback: bathroom at night; she bends over sink gripping the edge, sharp internal inhale.
Medium shot she steadies herself with controlled, forced breath.
Close-up bucket placed precisely under drip with dull thud.
Flashback: close-up neck pulse racing under skin; rapid thump-thump fades.
Close-up whiteboard note “Check level @ 7pm.” She checks it off with marker tick.
Long shot night bed; she lies eyes open as isolated plink grows louder.
Extreme close-up fingers tapping sheet fast and controlled with plink underneath.
Montage with measured cuts: pill, mop, chart, empty bucket, towel folded; metallic tiring rhythm layer builds.
Medium shot late night desk, presentation open titled “Final Version (v12)” with unsaved dot blinking; laptop fan hum joins mix.
Drop hits laptop screen with sharp electronic tap.
She wipes screen instantly with towel; cloth wipe audible.
Flashback: she grips her hair seated on floor, back to wall; internal gurgle cut short.
Close-up second bucket placed beside first with towels stacked; second dull thud.
Medium shot sofa; drop hits TV screen causing brief distortion with crackle and electronic pop.
She wipes, uses hairdryer, then reboots via remote in perfect sequence; hairdryer whirr bleeds into score.
Flashback: empty wall with broken photo frame hook; hollow room tone.
Close-up chest breathing shallow and quick syncing with faster plink.
Extreme close-up hand rubbing neck knot; relief lasts half a second as high-pitched strain enters score.
Long shot window; no rain outside while plink accelerates into stream.
Close-up bucket overflowing, water spilling across floor with uncontrolled slosh.
Close-up smartwatch glance with subtle ignored alert tone.
Medium shot kitchen: she makes breakfast while water spreads; familiar kitchen sounds under stream.
A drop hits her shoulder without emotional reaction; fabric tap.
She deploys towels and mop then reaches for umbrella amid frantic rustle.
Close-up umbrella opening indoors; water hits fabric with metallic snap leading to muffled rain.
She pours coffee under the umbrella; profound silence for one full beat.
Flashback: mirror with blank hollow reflection as tone drops out completely.
Medium shot water moving across floor; she feels it with bare feet and stops while stream continues.
She drops the umbrella and looks at mop, buckets, towels; umbrella clatter.
The Pause: locked medium shot; she stands motionless as single low cello note begins.
Slow zoom toward her eyes without blink; room tone only.
Camera passes through gaze into darkness with deep whoosh transition (transition bridge into Act V).
Minimal dark space with cello hold and emerging subtle electronics.
Diagram forming imperfectly: heart, knot, two figures, old photo with slight misalignment.
Diagram shrinks as camera ascends into attic space.
Close-up rusted fastener on damp cracked beam with static-like texture.
Memory of tangled frayed wires with single beam of light and overlapping indistinct whispers.
Attic opening revealing indifferent outside environment with distant wind.
Empty wall with missing photograph and hollow resonance.
Elements merge into single drop suspended mid-air in silence.
Drop dissolves into vapor; plink stops.
Pull back to woman in kitchen; her face holds quiet recognition as music resolves to soft minor chord.
Morning light enters; she removes main bucket while mop remains unused; slow plink returns.
Slow zoom on damaged ceiling fully visible; chord holds.
Freeze frame on ceiling; chord fades.
Fade to black with complete silence, padding final runtime to 10:00.
